certification.title: Accelerating healing
certification.desc: With more that 10 years professional experience, I never stop improving my skills and try to find a specific approach to every, because my aim is to cure and restore every single one of my clients.

reserve.title: Massage services
reserve.subtitle: Select one that fits your needs the most

type-anti-cellulite.title: Anti-cellulite massage
type-anti-cellulite.subtitle: An intensive type of massage performed with special anti-cellulite methodics
type-anti-cellulite.desc: Anti-cellulite massage is currently one of the most popular types of massage, because every person wants to see themselves in the mirror fit and slim.

type-sport.title: Sports massage
type-sport.subtitle: All types of sports massage: preliminary and restorative
type-sport.desc: A type of massage that is used to improve conditioning of the athlete and his sports performance. It is also used to increase physical endurance, relieve fatigue, prevent injuries and diseases of the musculoskeletal system.

type-shwedish.title: Swedish massage
type-shwedish.subtitle: Deep massage of muscles, soft tissues of the body, stretching of joints and tendons
type-shwedish.desc: Using lotion or oil, the massage starts with general areas and then moves on to massaging problem areas.

type-relax.title: Relaxing massage
type-relax.subtitle: The best remedy for getting rid of muscle tension and symptoms of chronic fatigue
type-relax.desc: The main purpose is to relieve a person of stress, and this goal is achieved through the use of a special impact technique by the massage therapist. The basis of this technique is the simultaneous effect on a person's muscles and joints.

type-lymph-drainage.title: Lymphatic drainage massage
type-lymph-drainage.subtitle: With the help of massage, the elimination of liquid, processed microelements and toxic substances from the cells is accelerated
type-lymph-drainage.desc: One of the best salon massages: it is performed along the lymphatic lines of the body, helps to improve the movement of lymph, remove excess fluid and eliminate swelling.

gift.title: Gift Certificates
gift.subtitle: Certificate for any massage of your selection
gift.redeem: Use this code to redeem your gift card

select-date.title: Select a date and timeslot
select-date.subtitle: After that you will be able to proceed to checkout

block.title: Read more about our service and advantages
block.content: One of the most pleasant and effective methods of treating certain diseases in Kyiv is therapeutic massage. It is based on the science of the human peripheral nervous system. Correctly and accurately affecting special nerve endings, doctors manage to achieve the desired treatment result. As a result, well-being improves significantly, and all this without the use of drugs or surgical intervention. Our highly qualified specialists perform therapeutic massage in the Holosiivskyi district and the Shevchenkovskyi district of Kyiv. The results will simply amaze you! After regular procedures: pain is reduced or completely stopped, recovery processes in case of injuries are accelerated, secondary changes in the muscles are reduced, blood circulation is improved, skin tone is increased, the removal of toxins from the body is accelerated, and the general well-being is improved.
